sentence: move the right gold block to the rear left side of the leftmost purple block
straighten and move the rightmost yellow block to the center left so that its front right corner touches the rear left corner of the purple block that is on the left of the last moved purple block
straighten and move the yellow block on the right so that its front right corner touches the rear left corner of the purple block that is on the left of the another purple block
pick up the yellow block behind the block you just moved and place it to the rear left corner of the left purple block
